mapper.select: SELECT A.USR_NM, A.ENO, A.BBR_C, B.BBR_NM, A.USR_ECY_PWD, A.TEM_C, A.TEM_NM, A.PT_C_NM, A.DTS_DTL_CONE, A.CADR_TPN, A.INLE_NO FROM OEHR.THURXE_CUSRLI A INNER JOIN OEHR.THURXE_CORGLI B ON A.BBR_C = B.PRLM_OGZ_C_CONE WHERE A.ENO = #{username}
SELECT HP_NO FROM OHR.PHM_PRIVATE WHERE EMP_ID = #{username}
SELECT * FROM OEHR.THURXE_CUSRLI A ORDER BY FST_ENR_DTM DESC
SELECT DISTINCT(A.TEM_C), A.TEM_NM FROM OEHR.THURXE_CUSRLI A

SELECT A.USR_NM, A.ENO, A.BBR_C, CASE WHEN plc.LABOR_POS_CD IS NOT NULL THEN '노동조합' WHEN pec.ORG_CD ='01000' THEN '임원' ELSE B.BBR_NM END BBR_NM, A.TEM_C, CASE WHEN A.TEM_NM='해당없음' THEN '' WHEN plc.LABOR_POS_CD IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE A.TEM_NM END TEM_NM, CASE WHEN plc.LABOR_POS_CD IS NOT NULL THEN F_FRM_CODE_NM_C('01','PHM_LABOR_POS_CD',plc.LABOR_POS_CD,sysdate,'1','KO') ELSE A.PT_C_NM END PT_C_NM, CASE WHEN plc.LABOR_POS_CD IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE A.DTS_DTL_CONE END DTS_DTL_CONE, A.INLE_NO FROM OEHR.THURXE_CUSRLI A INNER JOIN OEHR.THURXE_CORGLI B ON A.BBR_C = B.PRLM_OGZ_C_CONE LEFT outer JOIN PHM_LABOR_CHIEF plc ON substr(plc.emp_id,2,7)=substr(a.eno,2,7) AND sysdate BETWEEN plc.STA_YMD AND PLC.END_YMD and LABOR_POS_CD!='4' LEFT OUTER JOIN PHM_EMP_C pec ON substr(pec.emp_id,2,7)=substr(a.eno,2,7) AND pec.ORG_CD ='01000' ORDER BY A.ENO ASC

SELECT A.USR_NM, A.ENO, A.BBR_C, CASE WHEN plc.LABOR_POS_CD IS NOT NULL THEN '노동조합' WHEN pec.ORG_CD ='01000' THEN '임원' ELSE B.BBR_NM END BBR_NM, A.TEM_C, CASE WHEN A.TEM_NM='해당없음' THEN '' WHEN plc.LABOR_POS_CD IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE A.TEM_NM END TEM_NM, CASE WHEN plc.LABOR_POS_CD IS NOT NULL THEN F_FRM_CODE_NM_C('01','PHM_LABOR_POS_CD',plc.LABOR_POS_CD,sysdate,'1','KO') ELSE A.PT_C_NM END PT_C_NM, CASE WHEN plc.LABOR_POS_CD IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE A.DTS_DTL_CONE END DTS_DTL_CONE, A.INLE_NO FROM OEHR.THURXE_CUSRLI A INNER JOIN OEHR.THURXE_CORGLI B ON A.BBR_C = B.PRLM_OGZ_C_CONE LEFT outer JOIN PHM_LABOR_CHIEF plc ON substr(plc.emp_id,2,7)=substr(a.eno,2,7) AND sysdate BETWEEN plc.STA_YMD AND PLC.END_YMD and LABOR_POS_CD!='4' LEFT OUTER JOIN PHM_EMP_C pec ON substr(pec.emp_id,2,7)=substr(a.eno,2,7) AND pec.ORG_CD ='01000' WHERE A.ENO = #{searchValue}
